title: AI-Powered Study Buddy
description: A chatbot that helps students understand complex topics by breaking them down into simpler concepts. Uses spaced repetition for better retention.
author: Aarav Sharma

title: Smart Campus Navigation
description: AR-based navigation app for new students to find classrooms, labs, and facilities. Includes real-time crowd density information.
author: Priya Patel

title: Eco-Campus Initiative
description: IoT sensors to monitor and optimize energy consumption across campus buildings. Dashboard for tracking carbon footprint reduction.
author: Sneha Reddy

title: Peer Tutoring Platform
description: Connect students who need help with those who excel in specific subjects. Includes video calling, screen sharing, and whiteboard features.
author: Kavya Menon

title: Mental Health Check-in App
description: Anonymous mood tracking with AI-powered suggestions for stress relief. Connects with campus counseling services when needed.
author: Ananya Gupta

title: Lab Equipment Booking System
description: Online reservation system for lab equipment with real-time availability, maintenance schedules, and usage tutorials.
author: Arjun Nair
